alert.note: Alert for Champaign (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Champaign County through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bondville, or near Champaign, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Champaign, Rantoul, Urbana, Savoy, Mahomet, St. Joseph, Tolono, Thomasboro, Gifford, Bondville, Lake Of The Woods, Sadorus, Ludlow, Royal, Flatville and Willard Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 226 and 255. Interstate 72 between mile markers 177 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 171 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
